title: Young women on social media
description: How do women in different countries experience the online world?

vocabItems.definition: an affectionate liking or fondness for someone or something
cause (a debate, conversation, fight etc) to start happening
frightened or nervous because of a lack of confidence

vocabItems.word: Oh my gosh! / Oh my God!
vocabItems.definition: expression of feelings such as shock, surprise, anger, disbelief
make yourself smaller and don't use your full potential in order to make others feel comfortable
be vocal in defending or supporting a person who is being criticised or bullied
